description: The result that was ordered by the judiciary

orderedHearingId.description: The hearing in which the result was ordered

label.description: The result label provided from reference data during the resulting process

welshLabel.description: The corresponding welsh language result label provided from reference data during the resulting process

isAdjournmentResult.description: Indicates if the result is provided as part of an adjournment

isFinancialResult.description: Indicates if the result is provided as part of a financial order

isConvictedResult.description: Indicates if the provision of this result determines that the defendant has been convicted

isAvailableForCourtExtract.description: Indicates if the result can be entered into a court extract

amendmentReasonId.description: The reference data identifier for the amendment reason

amendmentReason.description: The description of the amendment reason

amendmentDate.description: Indicates if the result is amended and the date of amendment

cjsCode.description: The corresponding CJS data standard code

rank.description: The rank of the result for sequencing purposes

orderedDate.description: The date that the result was ordered

courtClerk.description: The court clerk that was responsible for recording result

delegatedPowers.description: When the results was ordered by delegated powers the details of teh user with delegate authority

fourEyesApproval.description: The details of the user that has approved an amended result

usergroups.description: The user groups that are authorised to view the result

category.description: The category of a result indicates if it is final, intermediate or ancilliary
